name: In Dungeon
description: In Dungeon is a 2D platformer hardcore made with pixel art. The main character, Allan Callahan, is trying to escape of the dungeon by facing different challenges and looking for other treasure hunters. Can you help him escape the dungeon before his fate is sealed?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 /  8 / 10 Processor: 2.0GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9-compatible graphics card with at least 512MB of video memory Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: This game is better played with a gamepad
